CustomField.description: This field considers 3 characters which could be either: 1. A numeric value of 0-999 (in minutes) i.e. 30 or 2. 0-99 in Percentage i.e. 20% If the field contains % sign then offset for Critical Zone is considered as mentioned percentage of Time Slot length Example: For an Appointment Slot Size of 2 hours (120 mins), 1. If the value entered is 30, then system will consider Appointment scheduled in last 30 minutes in Critical Zone. 2. If the value entered is 20%, then system will consider Appointment scheduled in last 24 minutes in Critical Zone i.e. 120*20/100 = 24
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter a value either in mins (upto 3 digits i.e. 0 - 999) or in % like 0-99%. In case of %age, Slot Duration in minutes will be considered.
CustomField.label: Critical Zone Value For Appointments
